messages.message:
I'm getting this 403 Forbidden error in celery-app-tasks on my crafting sandbox (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/hongrunzhou?cw=dev)
```------
 > [internal] load metadata for 549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/python:3.9.17 (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/python:3.9.17):
------
Dockerfile:8
--------------------
   6 |     
   7 |     
   8 | >>> FROM 549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/python:3.9.17 (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/python:3.9.17)
   9 |     LABEL maintainer="Instabase, Inc."
  10 |     COPY --from=wkhtmltox --chmod=755 /wkhtmltox/bin/wkhtmltopdf /usr/local/bin/wkhtmltopdf
--------------------
ERROR: failed to build: failed to solve: 549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/python:3.9.17 (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/python:3.9.17): failed to resolve source metadata for 549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/python:3.9.17 (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/instabase-build/python:3.9.17): unexpected status from HEAD request to https://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/v2/instabase-build/python/manifests/3.9.17: 403 Forbidden
make: *** [/home/owner/instabase/distributed-tasks/celery/app-tasks/../../../shared-utils/build-utils/shared/build-python.mk:176: build-docker-py-default] Error 1```
I have tried re-running ecr-login. The weird thing is that no other services have this issue. Does anyone have any idea on how to fix this? :thinking_face:
~Have you tried turning it off and on again~
Ahh yes, forgot to mention I did try restarting as well
Yeah, failing to stop `celery-app-tasks` . I'm restarting the workspace
Oh yea, I had to go in to kill the process :lolcry:
should be okay now. just had to restart the workspace
let me know if there's issues
